Package meka.classifiers.multilabel.meta

Class CM

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.meta.EM
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.meta.CM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, SemisupervisedClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class CM
extends EM
    CM.java - Classification Maximization using any multi-label classifier. A specified multi-label classifier is built on the training data. This model is then used to classify unlabelled data (e.g., the test data) The classifier is then retrained with all data, and the cycle continues ... (for I iterations).
    Version:
    July, 2014
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    EM, Serialized Form
